question: i am part of a minority community what are the schemes i am eligible for
answer:
Based on your profile as a student from a minority community in Karnataka, here are the eligible schemes for you:

**[Post Matric Scholarship for Minorities]**
- **Why You're Eligible**: You are part of a minority community and a student, which aligns with the eligibility criteria for this scholarship.
- **Benefits**: Financial assistance for students from minority communities to pursue post-matriculation courses.
- **How to Apply**: Applications can be submitted through the official state scholarship portal.
- **Official Website**: [Karnataka Minority Welfare Department](http://www.kmd.gov.in)
- **Apply Online**: [Post Matric Scholarship Application](http://www.kmd.gov.in/scholarship)

**[Merit-cum-Means Scholarship for Minorities]**
- **Why You're Eligible**: As a student from a minority community, you qualify for this scholarship aimed at supporting higher education.
- **Benefits**: Provides financial aid to students pursuing professional and technical courses.
- **How to Apply**: Applications are available through the official scholarship portal.
- **Official Website**: [Karnataka Minority Welfare Department](http://www.kmd.gov.in)
- **Apply Online**: [Merit-cum-Means Scholarship Application](http://www.kmd.gov.in/scholarship)

Please check the official websites for more details and ensure you meet any additional criteria specified in the application process. If you have any further questions or need assistance, feel free to ask!
